description:
Configuration for the MSI bundle using WiX.

See more: https://tauri.app/v1/api/config#wixconfig

language.description: The installer languages to build. See <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/msi/localizing-the-error-and-actiontext-tables>.

fragmentPaths.description: A list of paths to .wxs files with WiX fragments to use.

componentGroupRefs.description: The ComponentGroup element ids you want to reference from the fragments.

componentRefs.description: The Component element ids you want to reference from the fragments.

featureGroupRefs.description: The FeatureGroup element ids you want to reference from the fragments.

featureRefs.description: The Feature element ids you want to reference from the fragments.

mergeRefs.description: The Merge element ids you want to reference from the fragments.

skipWebviewInstall.description:
Disables the Webview2 runtime installation after app install.

Will be removed in v2, prefer the [`WindowsConfig::webview_install_mode`] option.

license.description:
The path to the license file to render on the installer.

Must be an RTF file, so if a different extension is provided, we convert it to the RTF format.

enableElevatedUpdateTask.description: Create an elevated update task within Windows Task Scheduler.

bannerPath.description:
Path to a bitmap file to use as the installation user interface banner. This bitmap will appear at the top of all but the first page of the installer.

The required dimensions are 493px × 58px.

dialogImagePath.description: Path to a bitmap file to use on the installation user interface dialogs. It is used on the welcome and completion dialogs. The required dimensions are 493px × 312px.
